model.level.collision

Interface Collision

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EnemyCollision, HeroCollision
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionImpl, EnemyCollisionImpl, HeroCollisionImpl

    public interface Collision
    This class models a generic collision whith different game elements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean blockCollision(java.util.Set<java.awt.Rectangle> blockSet)
      Checks if there's a collision with blocks.
      boolean bombCollision(java.util.Set<java.awt.Rectangle> bombSet)
      Cheks if there's a collision with a bomb.
      <X> boolean elementCollision(java.util.Set<X> set, java.util.function.Predicate<X> pred)
      Checks if there's a collision.
      boolean fireCollision(java.util.Set<Tile> afflictedTiles)
      Checks if there's a collision with fire.
      void updateEntityRec(Direction dir)
      Updates entity's hitbox.

    • Method Detail

      • blockCollision

        boolean blockCollision(java.util.Set<java.awt.Rectangle> blockSet)
        Checks if there's a collision with blocks.
        Parameters:
        blockSet - the set of blocks
        Returns:
        true if there's a collision, false otherwise

      • bombCollision

        boolean bombCollision(java.util.Set<java.awt.Rectangle> bombSet)
        Cheks if there's a collision with a bomb.
        Parameters:
        bombSet - the set of planted bombs
        Returns:
        true if there's a collision, false otherwise

      • fireCollision

        boolean fireCollision(java.util.Set<Tile> afflictedTiles)
        Checks if there's a collision with fire.
        Parameters:
        afflictedTiles - the set of tiles on fire
        Returns:
        true if there's a collision, false otherwise

      • elementCollision

        <X> boolean elementCollision(java.util.Set<X> set,
                             java.util.function.Predicate<X> pred)
        Checks if there's a collision.
        Type Parameters:
        X - the type of elements of the set
        Parameters:
        set - the set of elements
        pred - the predicate
        Returns:
        true if the entity can move, false otherwise

      • updateEntityRec

        void updateEntityRec(Direction dir)
        Updates entity's hitbox.
        Parameters:
        dir - the direction where he would move
